about_the_game:
This art pack includes 3D models of three prototyped German tanks. This content is immediately available upon purchase of the Expansion Pass 1.

The tank models represented in this pack include:


  • Panzer-Selbstfahrlafette II: A prototype light tank destroyer, two of which saw action in North Africa before production was halted.
  • VK.3001: A prototype medium-heavy tank designed in the late 1930s, but, after many delays, never entered production.
  • Löwe: A super-heavy tank designed by Krupp. Its production was halted in favor of the heavier Maus tank late in the war.

This content might be made purchasable individually at a later date
detailed_description:
Hearts of Iron IV: Expansion Pass 1


About the Game

This art pack includes 3D models of three prototyped German tanks. This content is immediately available upon purchase of the Expansion Pass 1.

The tank models represented in this pack include:


  • Panzer-Selbstfahrlafette II: A prototype light tank destroyer, two of which saw action in North Africa before production was halted.
  • VK.3001: A prototype medium-heavy tank designed in the late 1930s, but, after many delays, never entered production.
  • Löwe: A super-heavy tank designed by Krupp. Its production was halted in favor of the heavier Maus tank late in the war.

This content might be made purchasable individually at a later date

short_description: This cosmetic pack includes three new pieces of unit art, representing prototyped German armor designs. It is also available as part of the Hearts of Iron IV: Expansion Pass 1.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
